summary: An ongoing mod to fix the bug of certain items disappearing when equipped as a vampire. No Expansions required.
descriptionHtml:
Vampire Clothing Bug Fix Project v1.0 by EndgameV
..........................................................................................................................................

Description:
This mod is an ongoing project of mine to fix the issue of certain items not showing up on the player model if equipped while the player is a vampire. I\'ve done some scouting and found no fixes for this as of yet, so I\'ve made my own.

These Items will now 100% show up on the player model when equipped as a vampire.

A list of the items fixed so far:
- Thieves Guild Hood
- Guildmaster\'s Hood
- Ebony Shield
- Blades Shield
- Linwe\'s Hood

This list is comprised of the items I know were bugged and have fixed, if anyone knows of others that suffer the glitch let me know and I\'ll make sure they\'re fixed and added to the project.

Required Files:
You do NOT need Dawnguard or any expansions, just Skyrim. 

Installation:
Mod Manager:
Just click \'Download With Manager\' and install
Manually:
Extract the Data folder to your steamapps/skyrim/Data folder

Changlog:
v1.0 - Uploaded to Nexus
v1.1 - Added Blades Shield and Linwe\'s Hood
author: EndgameV
